item.title: 印度 12 月经济活动有所扩张，最新采购经理人指数显示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项速报调查显示，由于商品和服务需求在新订单的推动下持续改善，印度12月份的经济活动步伐加快。【原文：India’s economic activity gained pace in December, as demand for goods and services continued to improve, driven by new orders, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 电视工作室对 Skydance 与派拉蒙的交易亮起更多红旗
item.description: Fuse Media 是一家拉丁裔拥有的娱乐公司，它已成为对 Skydance 与派拉蒙合并案提出异议的最新一方，它向联邦监管机构表示，派拉蒙主席莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）将在交易中获得过高报酬，从而损害媒体业务。【原文：Fuse Media, a Latino-owned entertainment company, has become the latest party to raise objections to the pending Skydance-Paramount merger, suggesting to a federal regulator that Paramount Chair Shari Redstone would be overpaid in the deal, to the detriment of the media business.】

item.title: 星巴克任命首位中国增长官以促进销售
item.description: 星巴克公司在中国聘请了有史以来第一位首席增长官，负责吸引年轻咖啡饮用者回流，因为这家美国连锁店在其最大的国际市场上正与价格更低的本地竞争对手苦苦挣扎。【原文：Starbucks Corp. hired its first-ever chief growth officer in China, tasked with luring back young coffee drinkers as the US chain struggles with cheaper local rivals in its biggest international market.】

item.title: 私募基金从英国最弱势人群身上赚大钱
item.description:
当批评家们就私人资本进入经济和公共服务领域的成本进行辩论时，儿童福利院已成为一个热点。【原文：

As critics debate the cost of private capital’s inroads into many corners of the economy and public services, children’s homes have become a flashpoint.

】

item.title: 华尔街关注 2025 年特朗普关税和地缘政治引发的波动性飙升
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普的税收和关税政策存在不确定性，可能会扰乱市场，预计 2025 年又将是平静的一年，投资者应警惕出现更多类似 8 月份的震荡。【原文：Investors anticipating another calm year in 2025 should be on guard for more shocks like the one seen in August as uncertainty around Donald Trump’s tax and tariff policies threaten to roil markets.】

item.title: 学者称，官方数据可能高估了英国的通货膨胀率
item.description: 英国的通货膨胀率可能没有官方数据显示的那么高，因为学者们发现，能源成本的波动使得人们很难清楚地了解物价上涨的情况。【原文：UK inflation may not be as high as the official data shows, after academics found that volatile energy costs are making it difficult to get a clear picture of price rises.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦打击非法美元交易促进汇款增长
item.description: 巴基斯坦为遏制非法外汇交易所做的努力促使该国今年的汇款额创下历史新高。【原文：Pakistan’s efforts to curb illegal foreign-exchange trades are seen boosting the nation’s remittances to a record high this year.】

item.title: 世界银行称每四家印尼公司中就有一家涉及逃税
item.description: 根据世界银行的一项调查，印尼每四家公司中至少有一家逃税，这种现象在出口商中更为普遍。【原文：At least one in four firms in Indonesia evaded tax, which is more prevalent among exporters, according to a World Bank survey.】

item.title: 新加坡房屋销售量飙升至十年来新高，引发遏制担忧
item.description: 新加坡的房屋销售量跃升至十多年来的最高水平，印证了房地产市场的复苏，这也提高了人们对政府进一步抑制房地产的预期。【原文：Singapore home sales jumped to their highest level in more than a decade, confirming a property market revival that’s raising expectations of further government curbs.】

item.title: 沃特萨称美国制裁扰乱了伊朗原油向中国的流动
item.description: 据 Vortexa Ltd. 公司称，伊朗对中国的原油出口因美国对油轮实施更广泛的制裁而中断，挤压了石油流向这个欧佩克产油国最重要的客户。【原文：Iranian crude exports to China have been disrupted by broader US sanctions on tankers, according to Vortexa Ltd., squeezing oil flows to the OPEC producer’s most important customer.】

item.title: 新西兰计划改革，让地方议会专注于核心作用
item.description: 新西兰政府敦促地方议会专注于核心任务，不要将稀缺的资金用于会议中心或中央政府负责的项目。【原文：New Zealand’s government is urging local councils to focus on core tasks and not direct scarce funds to convention centers or projects that central government is responsible for.】

item.title: 孟加拉国领导人称明年年底可能举行大选
item.description: 孟加拉国临时领导人表示，孟加拉国计划在 2025 年年底至 2026 年上半年举行全国大选，这是在今年早些时候国家陷入政治动荡后，他的政府首次提供投票路线图。【原文：Bangladesh plans to hold national election between the end of 2025 and the first half of 2026, its interim leader said, making it the first time his administration has provided a roadmap on polls after the nation was thrown into political turmoil earlier this year.】

item.title: 泰国将于本周就缅甸冲突问题举行非正式会谈
item.description: 泰国将于本周主办东南亚国家联盟非正式会议，讨论饱受冲突蹂躏的缅甸的最新局势和未来发展方向。【原文：Thailand will host an informal meeting of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations this week to discuss the latest situation in strife-torn Myanmar and the way forward.】

item.title: 数据令人失望，中国主要债券收益率再创新低
item.description: 由于一连串低迷的经济数据刺激了对避险资产的需求，中国10年期主权债券收益率周一跌至历史新低。【原文：China’s 10-year sovereign yield slumped to a fresh record low Monday, as a string of sluggish economic data boosted demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 香港市建局将签署 130 亿港元贷款协议
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，香港市建局将与一家银行集团获得一笔 130 亿港元（17 亿美元）的五年期贷款，这是该局十多年来首次获得银团贷款。【原文：Hong Kong’s Urban Renewal Authority is set to obtain a HK$13 billion ($1.7 billion) five-year loan with a group of banks, according to people familiar with the matter, marking the authority’s first syndicated facility in over a decade.】

item.title: 拥挤的美国贸易为外资流入印度带来希望
item.description: (彭博社）— 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：(Bloomberg) — Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 拥挤的美国贸易为外资流入印度带来希望
item.description: (彭博社）— 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：(Bloomberg) — Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 尹炳世被弹劾后，韩国执政党党魁辞职
item.description: 韩国总统尹锡烈上周末因颁布简短的戒严令而遭到弹劾，在要求他辞职的呼声日益高涨之后，韩国执政党领导人表示他将下台。【原文：The leader of South Korea’s ruling party said he’s stepping down following mounting calls for his resignation, after President Yoon Suk Yeol was impeached over the weekend for his brief martial-law decree.】

item.title: 加拿大住房部长辞去特鲁多内阁职务
item.description: 加拿大住房部长肖恩-弗雷泽（Sean Fraser）将辞去内阁职务，并且不打算参加下届大选，此举正值贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）领导的自由党民调不佳，2025 年大选迫在眉睫之际。【原文：Canadian Housing Minister Sean Fraser is resigning from cabinet and doesn’t plan to run in the next election, a move that comes as Justin Trudeau’s Liberal Party languishes in the polls with an election looming in 2025.】

item.title: 卢拉说巴西唯一的问题是高利率
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周日晚间在接受电视采访时表示，巴西的利率过高，财政问题日益严重的责任在于中央银行的决策者。【原文：Brazil’s interest rates are too high, and responsibility for the growing fiscal problems lies with policymakers at the central bank, President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said Sunday night in a TV interview.】

item.title: 刺激效应减弱，中国消费意外放缓
item.description: 中国 11 月份的零售额增长意外减弱，凸显出中国政府进一步鼓励居民消费的紧迫性。【原文：China’s retail sales growth unexpectedly weakened in November, highlighting the urgency for Beijing to further encourage residents to spend.】

item.title: 中国经济复苏 "脆弱"，房价降幅放缓
item.description: 11 月份，中国房价降幅连续第三个月放缓，表明随着政策制定者加大力度结束房地产市场的低迷，房价开始趋于稳定。【原文：China’s home-price declines eased for a third month in November, suggesting values are beginning to stabilize as policymakers step up efforts to end the property slump.】

item.title: Grab 股票本季度的大涨让一些分析师看到了进一步上涨的希望
item.description: 一些分析师认为，Grab Holdings Ltd. 的股价在本季度迄今为止大涨 35% 之后，还会有更多的涨幅。【原文：There are more gains to come in Grab Holdings Ltd.’s stock after a 35% surge so far this quarter, according to some analysts.】

item.title: 尹炳世加入越来越多被清洗下台的韩国总统名单
item.description: 尹锡烈总统的下台可能既迅速又令人震惊，但他只是韩国越来越多上台后命运发生转变的领导人中的最新一位。【原文：President Yoon Suk Yeol’s demise may have been swift and shocking, but he is just the latest in a growing list of South Korean leaders who’ve seen their fortunes turn after rising to power.】

item.title: 520 亿美元的差距表明对安巴尼帝国的看法两极分化
item.description: 信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）今年在印度股票市场上表现不佳，导致分析师对该公司股票的预期与当前股价之间出现四年多来最大的差距。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd.’s underperformance to India’s equity market this year is driving the widest gap between analysts’ expectations for the stock and its current share price in more than four years.】

item.title: 美国降息预期升温，黄金维持两日跌势
item.description: 在美联储做出今年最后一次利率决定之前，黄金连续两天下跌，交易商也在权衡2025年的政策前景。【原文：Gold held a two-day drop ahead of the Federal Reserve’s final interest-rate decision of the year, with traders also weighing the policy outlook for 2025.】

item.title: 伦敦房主赶在印花税上调前出售房屋
item.description: 据Rightmove称，由于卖家试图在即将到来的增税之前抢占先机，伦敦的小户型住宅正大量涌入市场，这有可能抑制明年大部分时间的房产需求。【原文：Small homes in London are pouring onto the market as sellers try to get ahead of an upcoming tax increase, threatening to dampen demand for property for much of next year, according to Rightmove.】

item.title: 汇丰银行称贸易协议前景看好英印企业发展
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的数据显示，今年以来，英国和印度之间的业务蓬勃发展，因为两国的企业都预计两国政府将能够达成一项自由贸易协定。【原文：Business between the UK and India has boomed this year as firms in both countries anticipate their governments will be able to seal a free trade agreement, HSBC Holdings Plc data showed.】

item.title: 随着科维德时代债务到期，亚洲新兴市场债券销售将激增
item.description: 亚洲新兴国家政府明年的债券发行量将增加 68%，因为它们将为科维德时期的债务再融资，这将削弱投资者的潜在回报。【原文：Emerging Asian governments are set to boost bond issuance by as much as 68% next year as they refinance Covid-era debt, sapping potential returns for investors.】

item.title: 澳大利亚任命弗莱-麦基宾和贝克为澳大利亚央行利率制定委员会成员
item.description: 澳大利亚任命参与央行审查的 Renée Fry-McKibbin 和本迪戈和阿德莱德银行前首席执行官 Marnie Baker 为储备银行新的货币政策委员会成员。【原文：Australia appointed Renée Fry-McKibbin, who participated in the review of the central bank, and former Bendigo and Adelaide Bank CEO Marnie Baker to the Reserve Bank’s new monetary policy committee.】
